trans-unit.source: Provides the atomic unit of recognized speech.
trans-unit.target: Gir atomic enheten gjenkjenner tale.

trans-unit.source: All results returned by a recognition engine are constructed of RecognizedWordUnit objects.
trans-unit.target: Alle resultatene som returneres av en recognition-motor konstruert RecognizedWordUnit objekter.

trans-unit.source: An array of RecognizedWordUnit objects is accessible for any recognition operation through the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> object.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av objekter RecognizedWordUnit er tilgjengelige for alle recognition operasjoner via den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to providing a measure of recognition certainty (<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Confidence%2A>) a RecognizedWordUnit instance provides: - Normalized and exact (or lexical) text representations for a recognized word.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til å gi et mål av recognition sikkerhet (<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Confidence%2A>) gir en forekomst av RecognizedWordUnit: – normalisert og nøyaktige (eller Leksikalsk) tekstrepresentasjoner for et gjenkjent ord.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Confidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Text%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.LexicalForm%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Text%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.LexicalForm%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.LexicalForm%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Text%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>

trans-unit.source: - Pronunciation information using characters from a supported phonetic alphabet, such as the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) or the Universal Phone Set (UPS).
trans-unit.target: -Uttale informasjon med tegn fra en støttet alfabetet, for eksempel International alfabetet (IPA) eller den universelle telefon angitt (UPS).

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Pronunciation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon se <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Pronunciation%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Pronunciation%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Formatting for printing.
trans-unit.target: -Formatering for utskrift.

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DisplayAttributes> class and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.DisplayAttributes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon, kan du se den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DisplayAttributes>klassen og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.DisplayAttributes%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.DisplayAttributes%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DisplayAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: If `text` or `pronunciation` are `null`, "", or <xref:System.String.Empty> and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> is used in a recognition operation, the recognition engine will generate appropriate values in any output <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> instance.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `text` eller `pronunciation` er `null`, "", eller <xref:System.String.Empty>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>brukes i en operasjon for gjenkjenning recognition motoren genererer passende verdier i alle utdata <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> </xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Direct construction of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> instances is typically used only when emulating recognition operations using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> class and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class.
trans-unit.target: Direkte konstruksjon av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>forekomster brukes bare når emulerer recognition operasjoner ved hjelp av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klassen og den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metodene for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>klasse.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>

trans-unit.source: For actual applications, do not directly construct <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>, rather obtain it through the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> object.
trans-unit.target: For faktiske programmer, ikke direkte konstruere <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>, i stedet skaffes via den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>

trans-unit.source: The normalized text for a recognized word.
trans-unit.target: Normalisert teksten for et gjenkjent ord.

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, "", or <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, "", eller <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref> value from 0.0 through 1.0 indicating the certainty of word recognition.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""> </xref> verdi fra 0,0 til 1,0 som angir sikkerhet for word gjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The phonetic spelling of a recognized word.
trans-unit.target: Et gjenkjent ord fonetisk stavemåten.

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, "", or <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, "", eller <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The unnormalized text for a recognized word.
trans-unit.target: Ikke-normalisert teksten for et gjenkjent ord.

trans-unit.source: This argument is required and may not be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, "", or <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet er obligatorisk og kan ikke være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, "", eller <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Defines the use of white space to display recognized words.
trans-unit.target: Definerer bruk av mellomrom til å vise gjenkjent ord.

trans-unit.source: The location of the recognized word in the audio input stream.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av gjenkjent ord i lyd inndataflyten.

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan være <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The length of the audio input corresponding to the recognized word.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på den lyd inndata tilsvarer gjenkjent ordet.

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan være <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value, assigned by the recognizer, that represents the likelihood that a recognized word matches a given input.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som er tilordnet kontrolleres, som representerer sannsynligheten for at et gjenkjent ord samsvarer med en gitt inndata.

trans-unit.source: Confidence scores do not indicate the absolute likelihood that a word was recognized correctly.
trans-unit.target: Konfidensnivået resultater angir ikke absolutt sannsynligheten for at et ord gjenkjennes på riktig måte.

trans-unit.source: Instead, confidence scores provide a mechanism for comparing the relative accuracy of multiple recognition alternates for a given input.
trans-unit.target: I stedet mekanisme konfidensnivået resultater for sammenligning av relative nøyaktigheten av flere recognition alternativer for en gitt inndata.

trans-unit.source: This facilitates returning the most accurate recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det enklere å returnere mest nøyaktige recognition resultatet.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a recognized word has a confidence score of 0.8, this does not mean that the word has an 80% chance of being the correct match for the input.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en gjenkjent ord har konfidensnivået ligge på 0,8, betyr dette ikke at ordet er en 80% sannsynlighet for blir riktig treff for inndata.

trans-unit.source: It means that the word is more likely to be the correct match for the input than other results that have confidence scores less than 0.8.
trans-unit.target: Det vil si at det er et større sannsynlighet for å være riktig treff for inndataene enn andre resultater som har konfidensnivået scores mindre enn 0,8.

trans-unit.source: A confidence score on its own is not meaningful unless you have alternative results to compare against, either from the same recognition operation or from previous recognitions of the same input.
trans-unit.target: Konfidensnivået ligge på sin egen er meningsløst Hvis du ikke har alternative resultatene skal sammenlignes med, fra samme recognition-operasjon eller fra forrige anerkjennelser på samme inndataene.

trans-unit.source: The values returned by Confidence are relative and unique to each recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene som returneres av konfidensnivået er relativ og unike hver recognition-motoren.

trans-unit.source: There is no definition of how confidence values between two different recognition engines compare, nor how the Confidence of individual <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> objects define the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen definisjon av hvordan konfidensnivået verdier mellom to ulike recognition motorer sammenligne eller hvordan konfidensnivået for individuelle <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>objekter definerer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>av en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>

trans-unit.source: A speech recognition engine may assign a low confidence score to spoken input for various reasons, including background interference, inarticulate speech, or unanticipated words or word sequences.
trans-unit.target: En motor for talegjenkjenning kan tilordnes lav konfidensnivået ligge sier inndata for ulike årsaker, inkludert bakgrunnen forstyrrelser, inarticulate tale, eller uventet ord eller word-sekvenser.

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance, you can modify the confidence level at which speech input is accepted or rejected with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet bruker en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>forekomsten, kan du endre konfidensnivået ved som tale inndataene godkjennes eller avvises med én av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: Confidence thresholds for the shared recognizer, managed by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, are associated with a user profile and stored in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: Konfidensnivået terskelverdi for den delte gjenkjenneren administreres av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, er tilknyttet en brukerprofil og lagres i Windows-registret.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Applications should not write changes to the registry for the properties of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Programmer kan ikke skrive endringene i registret for egenskaper av delt gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: A relative measure of the certainty of correct recognition for a word.
trans-unit.target: En relativ mål av sikkerhet for riktig recognition for et ord.

trans-unit.source: The value is from 0.0 to 1.0, for low to high confidence, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er fra 0,0 1.0 for til konfidensnivået henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: Gets formatting information used to create the text output from the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter informasjon om brukes til å opprette tekst-utdataene fra gjeldende formatering <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DisplayAttributes> object returned by the DisplayAttributes property specifies the leading and trailing spaces to be used with a given word, if any.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DisplayAttributes>objektet som ble returnert av egenskapen DisplayAttributes angir innledende og avsluttende mellomrom som skal brukes med en gitt word eventuell.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DisplayAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use this formatting information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DisplayAttributes> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker denne informasjon om formatering av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DisplayAttributes>opplisting.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DisplayAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the use of white space to display of the contents of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Angir bruk av mellomrom for visning av innholdet i en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unnormalized text of a recognized word.
trans-unit.target: Henter ikke-normalisert teksten for et gjenkjent ord.

trans-unit.source: In most cases the values returned by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Text%2A> and LexicalForm are identical.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller verdiene som returneres av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Text%2A>og LexicalForm er identiske.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, recognition engines may use speech normalization to return more user-friendly or colloquial text representations of audio input.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenning motorer kan imidlertid bruke tale normalization for å returnere mer brukervennlig eller hverdagslige tekstrepresentasjoner av inndata.

trans-unit.source: Speech normalization is the use of special constructs or symbols to express speech in writing.
trans-unit.target: Tale normalization er bruken av spesielle konstruksjoner eller symboler til express tale i skriving.

trans-unit.source: For example, normalization can replace the spoken words "a dollar and sixteen cents" with "$1.16" in output text.
trans-unit.target: Normalization kan for eksempel erstatte ordene "en valuta og&16; noe" med "$1.16" i utdatateksten.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the text of a recognized word, without any normalization.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.String>som inneholder tekst i en gjenkjent ord uten noen normalization.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the phonetic spelling of a recognized word.
trans-unit.target: Henter fonetisk stavingen av et gjenkjent ord.

trans-unit.source: The contents of Pronunciation indicate which pronunciation the speech recognition engine used to match speech input to one of its loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i uttale angir hvilken uttale motor for talegjenkjenning brukes til å samsvare med tale inndataene til en av de innlastede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Pronunciations may be defined in the speech recognition engine's internal lexicon, in a lexicon document that is linked from a recognition grammar in a loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object, or inline in a recognition grammar in a loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: Uttaler kan defineres i tale recognition-motoren intern leksikon, i et leksikon-dokument som er koblet fra en recognition grammatikk i en lastet <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>-objekt eller innebygd i et recognition grammatikk i en lastet <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: A speech recognition engine may also create pronunciations for uncommon words whose pronunciations are not defined in a lexicon or grammar to which the speech recognition engine currently has access.
trans-unit.target: En motor for talegjenkjenning kan også opprette uttaler for uvanlig ord der uttaler ikke er definert i en leksikon eller grammatikk som motor for Talegjenkjenning for øyeblikket har tilgang til.

trans-unit.source: Many Windows-based Unicode fonts, such as Courier New, support the display of IPA strings.
trans-unit.target: Mange Windows-baserte Unicode-skrifter, for eksempel Courier New støtter visning av IPA strenger.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [International Phonetic Alphabet](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=58363).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [International alfabetet](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=58363).

trans-unit.source: A string of characters from a supported phonetic alphabet, such as the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) or the Universal Phone Set (UPS).
trans-unit.target: En tegnstreng fra en støttet alfabetet, for eksempel International alfabetet (IPA) eller den universelle telefon angitt (UPS).

trans-unit.source: Gets the normalized text for a recognized word.
trans-unit.target: Henter normalisert teksten for et gjenkjent ord.

trans-unit.source: In most cases the values returned by Text and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.LexicalForm%2A> will be identical.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller verdiene som returneres av tekst og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.LexicalForm%2A>vil være identiske.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit.LexicalForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, recognition engines may use speech normalization to return more user-friendly or colloquial text representations of audio input.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenning motorer kan imidlertid bruke tale normalization for å returnere mer brukervennlig eller hverdagslige tekstrepresentasjoner av inndata.

trans-unit.source: Speech normalization is the use of special constructs or symbols to express speech in writing.
trans-unit.target: Tale normalization er bruken av spesielle konstruksjoner eller symboler til express tale i skriving.

trans-unit.source: For example, normalization can replace the spoken words "a dollar and sixteen cents" with "$1.16" in output text.
trans-unit.target: Normalization kan for eksempel erstatte ordene "en valuta og&16; noe" med "$1.16" i utdatateksten.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the normalized text output for a given input word.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder utgående normalisert tekst for et gitt inndata ord.
